com.here.android.mpa.ftcr

Class FTCRRoute

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.ftcr.FTCRRoute

  • public class FTCRRoute
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a distinct fleet telematics custom path connecting two or more waypoints GeoCoordinate. A FTCRRoute consists of a list of maneuvers and route links.

    IMPORTANT: Fleet Telematics Custom Route is a Beta feature. The related classes are subject to change without notice.

    See Also:
    FTCRRouter

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FTCRRoute.FTCRManeuver
      Represents information about maneuver on the FTCRRoute.
      static class  FTCRRoute.FTCRRouteLink
      Represents a single segment of a road FTCRRoute.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int WHOLE_ROUTE
      Constant that can be used in methods like FTCRNavigationManager.getRemainingDistance(int) or FTCRNavigationManager.getRemainingTime(int).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getBaseTime()
      Gets the estimated base time to the final destination, considering transport mode but not traffic conditions.
      GeoBoundingBox getBoundingBox()
      Gets the smallest GeoBoundingBox that contains the entire route.
      java.util.List<GeoCoordinate> getGeometry()
      Returns the geometry of the FTCRRoute.
      long getLength()
      Gets total travel distance for the route, in meters.
      java.util.List<FTCRRoute.FTCRManeuver> getManeuvers()
      Gets the list of all maneuvers that travelers will encounter along the route.
      java.util.List<FTCRRoute.FTCRRouteLink> getRouteLinks()
      Returns all FTCRRoute.FTCRRouteLink in this route.
      long getTrafficTime()
      Gets the estimated traffic time to the final destination, considering traffic and transport mode.
      long getTravelTime()
      Gets the estimated total travel time in seconds optionally considering traffic depending on the request parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • getGeometry

        public java.util.List<GeoCoordinate> getGeometry()
        Returns the geometry of the FTCRRoute. The geometry is a returned as a list of GeoCoordinate that can be used to create a polyline.
        Returns:
        a list of GeoCoordinate.

      • getLength

        public long getLength()
        Gets total travel distance for the route, in meters.
        Returns:
        Length in meters.

      • getBaseTime

        public long getBaseTime()
        Gets the estimated base time to the final destination, considering transport mode but not traffic conditions.
        Returns:
        Time in seconds.

      • getTrafficTime

        public long getTrafficTime()
        Gets the estimated traffic time to the final destination, considering traffic and transport mode.
        Returns:
        Time in seconds.

      • getTravelTime

        public long getTravelTime()
        Gets the estimated total travel time in seconds optionally considering traffic depending on the request parameters.
        Returns:
        Time in seconds.

      • getBoundingBox

        public GeoBoundingBox getBoundingBox()
        Gets the smallest GeoBoundingBox that contains the entire route.
        Returns:
        The GeoBoundingBox.

      • getManeuvers

        public java.util.List<FTCRRoute.FTCRManeuver> getManeuvers()
        Gets the list of all maneuvers that travelers will encounter along the route.
        Returns:
        The list of FTCRRoute.FTCRManeuver objects.

      • getRouteLinks

        public java.util.List<FTCRRoute.FTCRRouteLink> getRouteLinks()
        Returns all FTCRRoute.FTCRRouteLink in this route.
        Returns:
        all FTCRRouteLink.
